column21: Roadmap detailing - How adequate is your roadmap detailed with respect to the timeline?
column22: Roadmap items - Which items are on your product roadmap?
column23: Reliability - How often do you adjust your product roadmap?
column24: Confidence - How confident are you that the roadmap items have the expected impact on goals?
column25: Discovery – How do  you conduct  product discovery?
column26: Prioritization - How do you prioritise items?
column27: Extent of alignment - How do you align your stakeholders?
column28: Responsibility – Who is responsible for placing items on the roadmap?
column29: Ownership of the product roadmap - Who owns the product roadmap and is accountable?
column30: Tools - Which tool(s) do you use to manage your roadmap process?
column31: Where do you look for information about Software Product Management? (tick all that apply)
